attributes.action: raise in carers allowance working money for 16 hours
attributes.additional_details: For the last three years my wife has had to decline her pay raise as it would take it over the £100 threshold and I think it's about time that this was raised against inflation to a modest £150. Yet family's on a good wage can get family working credits where is the justice and us severe disabled people are the ones that always suffer as well as the elderly who suffer dredful
